name: Miles Teller
full_text: The premiere of Top Gun:Maverick has finally arrived. Im so proud of all the work everyone put in to deliver a film for the ages and it all starts at the top with the living legend TC. Can’t wait to share this moment with all of you soon. Time to “Turn and Burn” baby! https://t.co/jXlJ1H1hkj

name: Lady Gaga
full_text: When I wrote this song for Top Gun: Maverick, I didn’t even realize the multiple layers it spanned across the film’s heart, my own psyche, and the nature of the world we’ve been living in. I’ve been working on it for years, perfecting it, trying to make it ours. https://t.co/1GReWGW8Ql
